text: Points are generated when your lord inflicts damage (damage inflicted on higher tier units will confer more points).

Waaagh! points are generated for each entity engaged in melee. When enough points are generated, the bar will fill up and the Waaagh! ability will become available for use. The more friendly units in the battle the more points required to fill the bar. Each use of the ability also increases the number of points required.
Prisoner points are gained by killing enemy units that are routing or shattered.
As Tomb Kings warriors die on the battlefield, their spirits enter the Realm of Souls.
Points are generated for each enemy entity killed.
Points are generated based on the amount of damage your units take.
Points are generated for killing entities in units that have negative morale states.
Points are generated by casting spells with the Winds of Magic.
